title: Login button not responding on mobile devices
description: The login button becomes unresponsive on mobile devices after entering credentials. Users have to refresh the page multiple times to make it work.
reproductionSteps:
1. Open app on mobile device
2. Navigate to login page
3. Enter valid credentials
4. Click login button
5. Notice button doesn't respond

title: Dashboard loading time exceeds 10 seconds
description: The main dashboard takes an unusually long time to load, significantly impacting user experience and productivity.
reproductionSteps:
1. Log into the application
2. Navigate to main dashboard
3. Observe loading time
4. Compare with expected performance

title: User profile image upload fails with large files
description: Profile image upload functionality fails when users attempt to upload images larger than 2MB, showing unclear error messages.
reproductionSteps:
1. Go to user profile settings
2. Click on change profile picture
3. Select an image larger than 2MB
4. Attempt to upload
5. Observe error message

title: Search functionality returns incorrect results
description: The search feature is returning irrelevant results and missing exact matches, making it difficult for users to find what they're looking for.
reproductionSteps:
1. Navigate to search page
2. Enter a specific search term
3. Review search results
4. Verify if results match search criteria

title: Email notifications not being sent to users
description: System is failing to send email notifications for important events like password resets, account activations, and security alerts.
reproductionSteps:
1. Trigger an action that should send email
2. Check user's email inbox
3. Verify notification preferences
4. Check spam/junk folders

title: Data export feature generates corrupted CSV files
description: When users export data to CSV format, the resulting files are corrupted and cannot be opened properly in Excel or other spreadsheet applications.
reproductionSteps:
1. Navigate to data export section
2. Select CSV format
3. Choose data range
4. Click export
5. Attempt to open downloaded file

title: Navigation menu overlaps with content on tablet devices
description: On tablet devices in landscape mode, the navigation menu overlaps with the main content area, making it impossible to interact with certain elements.
reproductionSteps:
1. Access app on tablet device
2. Rotate to landscape mode
3. Open navigation menu
4. Notice overlap with main content

title: Form validation messages not displaying correctly
description: Error messages for form validation are not appearing consistently, leaving users confused about what fields need to be corrected.
reproductionSteps:
1. Navigate to any form in the application
2. Leave required fields empty
3. Submit the form
4. Observe validation message display

title: API timeout errors during peak usage hours
description: Users experience frequent API timeout errors between 9 AM - 11 AM and 2 PM - 4 PM, coinciding with peak usage periods.
reproductionSteps:
1. Use application during peak hours (9-11 AM or 2-4 PM)
2. Perform actions that require API calls
3. Monitor for timeout errors
4. Document frequency and patterns

title: Print functionality cuts off content on certain pages
description: When users attempt to print reports or documents, content gets cut off at page boundaries, making printed copies incomplete and unusable.
reproductionSteps:
1. Navigate to a report or document page
2. Click print or use Ctrl+P
3. Preview the print layout
4. Observe content cutoff issues
